summary: Conjure a Spriggan, Spriggan Matron, or Spriggan Earth Mother through Restoration magic.
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever felt that Conjuration got all the good summoning spells, and Restoration was nothing more than a glorified, mana using health potion? Well no more! This mod add 6 spells to the Restoration school to conjure spriggans in a lore friendly way. Instead of using conjuration to suck up some poor spriggan in the multiverse, you instead use Restoration to send magical life energy into the ground to "grow" a spriggan (Sorry no cool pulling out of the ground or growing FX). These spriggans may last temporaly or permantly (Flame thrall permant) depending on which spell you use. The spells may be found inside Eldergleam Sanctuary on a table in the main area.

The spell are thus:

Create Spriggan = Create a short lived Spriggan for 60 seconds
Create Spriggan (Greater) = Create a permant Spriggan
Create Spriggan Matron = Create a short lived Spriggan Matron for 60 seconds
Create Spriggan Matron (Greater) = Create a permant Spriggan Matron
Create Spriggan Earth Mother = Create a short lived Spriggan Earth Mother for 60 seconds
Create Spriggan Earth Mother (Greater) = Create a permant Spriggan Earth Mother

The mana costs of these spells have been balanced around vanilla antronarch summons. All summoned spriggans have had their ability to dominate animals taken away for balance reasons.

Requires: Skyrim, Update (latest patch), & Dawnguard

I made this mod for my druid character, so that he could have summons without having to break his skill set of Destruction, Alteration, and Restoration. I hope you will find them useful too!

There is now a version with the summoned spriggans not making ambient swarm noises. The swarm spell the spriggans use still make swarm noises.
author: Rivven aka HisLeast
